page.title: 13Employment_E.K._Hospital
page.content: {Hairmyres }is situated in the out skirts of East Kilbride on the road to Eaglesham. The hospital was built during the war by the Polish prisoners of war.There are 21 wards with about 15 to 30 patients in each ward. Expectant mothers can no longer go to Hairmyres due to the closure of the maternity unit.Also,very young children must be transferred to other hospitals as there are no paediatricians. I interviewed an ambulanceman from Hairmyres hospital.He said that it was a very pleasant place to work.They work a day shift, a night shift and a backshift.He works 8 hours a day.They have 32 ambulance drivers in an ambulance depot.The busiest shift is weekend backshift.They are trained not to think that it is their fault when someone dies in their ambulance.
